title.value: Advanced Diffusion MR Imaging for Multiple Sclerosis in the Brain and Spinal Cord
title.justification: The title corresponds to the focus of the paper, which is on advanced diffusion magnetic resonance imaging techniques for assessing multiple sclerosis in the brain and spinal cord.
title.quote: Advanced Diffusion MR Imaging for Multiple Sclerosis in the Brain and Spinal Cord

extractions.description: This paper reviews recent advancements in advanced diffusion MR imaging techniques for assessing multiple sclerosis in the brain and spinal cord. It highlights complex and sophisticated MRI analysis methods that provide more detailed insight into microstructural changes than conventional diffusion tensor imaging (DTI).

type.justification: The paper is a review of existing imaging techniques and their applications in the context of multiple sclerosis, focusing on theoretical advancements rather than empirical data collection or experimentation.
type.quote: This paper reviews the current status of recent advanced diffusion MRI for assessing MS in vivo.

name.justification: The focus of the paper is on magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) techniques for medical purposes, specifically in assessing multiple sclerosis.
